Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde national football team were the first nation to qualify for the Round of 16.
Beb√©, Steven Moreira, Roberto Lopes and Jovane Cabral should be back in the starting XI to be named by head coach Bubista.
Mauritania is likely to stick with the same team that won against Algeria.
Amir Abdou is likely to deploy the 4-1-4-1 formation.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The winner from this Round of 16 battle will take on either Morocco or South Africa
Cape Verde progressed to the Round of 16 after topping the Group B table while Mauritania just narrowly made it by finishing in a better points tally than other third-place finishers
Cape Verde are undefeated in the 2023 AFCON while Mauritania recorded its first victory last time out against 2019 AFCON winners, Algeria
